thread.title: 'I.N.D.I.A Bloc Will Change Constitution For Muslim Quota': PM Modi In UP's Mirzapur
thread.title_full: 'I.N.D.I.A Bloc Will Change Constitution For Muslim Quota': PM Modi In UP's Mirzapur

author: ABP News Bureau
title: 'I.N.D.I.A Bloc Will Change Constitution For Muslim Quota': PM Modi In UP's Mirzapur
text: During a poll rally in UP's Mirzapur, PM Modi alleged that the I.N.D.I.A bloc will "change the Constitution to provide reservation to Muslims". As the country is headed for the last and seventh phase of the Lok Sabha elections 2024, Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday addressed a public meeting in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh. During the public meeting, PM Modi came down heavily at the I.N.D.I.A bloc and alleged that the alliance has "decided to change Constitution to give reservation to Muslims." Calling the alliance 'racist" and "casteist" and accusing them of nepotism, PM Modi said: "People of Uttar Pradesh understand politics. Any intelligent person would never invest in a party that is already falling. Who will vote for them? People of the country have understood INDI alliance and that they are communal ('sampradiak'), casteist ('jativadi') and ‘parivaarwadi’.” VIDEO | “People of Uttar Pradesh understand politics. Any intelligent person would never invest in a party that is already falling. Who will vote for them? People of the country have understood INDI alliance and that they are communal ('sampradiak'), casteist ('jativadi') and…— Press Trust of India (@PTI_News) [pic.twitter.com/HGd3MfDGED] [May 26, 2024] Referring to a speculation on an understanding within the alliance of choosing five different prime ministers in five years if the I.N.D.I.A bloc wins elections, PM Modi asked: "...The I.N.D.I alliance partners are saying that there will be 5 Prime Ministers in 5 years. Can such a big country run like this?...can a PM run the country who will be busy saving his post...So the country has decided to bring in a strong PM to build a strong country, and that is why NDA is getting massive support... No one wants to waste their vote on SP..." — ANI (@ANI) [#WATCH]| Addressing a public meeting in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, Prime Minister Narendra Modi says, "...The INDI alliance partners are saying that there will be 5 Prime Ministers in 5 years. Can such a big country run like this?...can a PM run the country who will be busy saving… [pic.twitter.com/bdtv9NNYjd] [May 26, 2024] Drawing comparison between his dedication to work for the backward class and the opposition's "dedication to vote bank", he said: "Samajwadi party and Congress people are dedicated to vote bank whereas Modi is dedicated to the poor, Dalits and backward people of the country..." — ANI (@ANI) [#WATCH]| Addressing a public meeting in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, Prime Minister Narendra Modi says, "Samajwadi party and Congress people are dedicated to vote bank whereas Modi is dedicated to the poor, Dalits and backward people of the country..." [pic.twitter.com/BTyL5rFWh1] [May 26, 2024] Prime Minister Modi further lashed out at the opposition alliance for being "extremely communal" and alleged how Samajwadi Party "looked forward to the mafias as part of its vote bank"and "released terrorists". "The country has come to know the INDI alliance people very well. These people are extremely communal. They are extremely racist and are extreme nepotists. Whenever their government is formed, these people make decisions on this basis...Law and Order and the Samajwadi Party are opposite to each other...Samajwadi Party government used to look forward to the mafias as a part of the vote bank...But under the Yogi government action is being taken on the mafias," PM Modi said. — ANI (@ANI) [#WATCH]| Addressing a public meeting in Mirzapur, Uttar Pradesh, Prime Minister Narendra Modi says, "The country has come to know the INDI alliance people very well. These people are extremely communal. They are extremely racist and are extreme nepotists. Whenever their… [pic.twitter.com/cTksDCCk0n] [May 26, 2024] PM Modi also claimed during the rally that the people of "India have decided to form the Modi government for the third time because of its good policies and intentions." "My nation comes first,” he added. VIDEO | Here's what PM Modi (— Press Trust of India (@PTI_New [@narendramodi]) said while addressing an election rally in Mirzapur, UP. “Six phases of the Lok Sabha election have been conducted. The people of India have decided to form the Modi government for the third time because of its good policies and… [pic.twitter.com/N2A220GbtZ] ALSO READ: Priyanka Gandhi Slams Modi Over 'Mujra' Remark, Says 'PM Ke Pad Ko Itna Gira Chuke...'
